title: Might Makes Right
description: Elysia is the most famous city in the world. A place that gives life to super powered individuals more commonly referred to as Stellars. When Elysia's premiere Stellar team the Sublime are all but destroyed, and burnt bodies start showing up around the city, it's up to Cimmerian Shade and a grouping of "street-Level" heroes to ensure the city doesnâ€™t fall. With everyone out to control the fate of Elysia, these heroes will have to contend with a Governor with a dark secret, super powered lunatics, the undead, magic, and the betrayal of friends. In a world where Might Makes Right, can anyone win?
author: Emerson Cain
